page.title: 05POPULATION MOVEMENT.
page.content: Our survey showed that 77% of the people questioned had been born outside the Deganwy area,although 25% of these had been born in Wales,while 52% had been born in England.Very few people in the area had been born in Scotland,Northern Ireland or overseas.53% had lived in the Deganwy area for more than ten years.36% moved into this area because of retirement and 18% because of their work.70% of all householders owned one or more car,while 7% said that they had a computer at home.22% of all those questioned owned one or more pet.One family had a pet snake and another a lamb.
